course_title: Acute and Complex Chronic Disease Management for AGACNP I
course_description: The first of a two-courses of population focused diagnosis, treatment and disease management designed to prepare the adult gero-acute care nurse practitioner student to recognize and manage the most common acute/episodic and complex chronic health conditions. Evidenced based practice is emphasized.
sections: Class Nbr: 3827, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 9-10:50a, Instructor: J. Adamski, Status: Open
